content.json:
# Semperis Directory Services Protector

**Semperis Directory Services Protector** (DSP) provides valuable insight into your Active Directory security posture. It queries your Active Directory environment and performs a set of tests against many aspects of Active Directory's security posture, including AD Delegation, Account security, AD Infrastructure security, Group Policy security, and Kerberos security.

Each security indicator is mapped to MITRE ATT&CK® framework categories, explains what was evaluated, and indicates how likely an exposure will compromise Active Directory. 

Each IoE found highlights weak Active Directory configurations and provides actionable guidance on how to close gaps before they are exploited by attackers. Using this workbook, you can determine how you are doing from a security perspective, compared to best practice environments.

In case of security regressions, Semperis Directory Services Protector will trigger alerts through Microsoft Sentinel.
# Security Indicators mapped to MITRE ATT&CK® Framework Categories:

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: Specify the time range on which to query the data

parameters.name: MitreFramework
parameters.label: MITRE ATT&CK Framework
parameters.query:
dsp_parser
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags)
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array parse_csv(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv) to typeof(string)
| summarize Count = count() by SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv
| order by Count desc, SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv asc
| project Value = SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv, Label = strcat(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv)

parameters.name: Status
parameters.query:
dsp_parser
| where isnotempty(Result)
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Result)
| order by Count desc, Result asc
| project Value = Result, Label = strcat(Result)

content.query:
dsp_parser_new
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags) 
| where Result in ({Status})
| extend SecurityFrameworkTagList = parse_csv(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv)
| extend MitreFramework = pack_array({MitreFramework})
| extend FilterIntersection = set_intersect(SecurityFrameworkTagList, MitreFramework)
| extend FilterIntersectionCount = array_length(FilterIntersection)
| where FilterIntersectionCount > 0
| union (CommonSecurityLog 
| extend p1Array = split(AdditionalExtensions,"|")
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Array
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Array)
| extend Name=tostring(split(p1Array,"=")[0]),Value=substring(p1Array,indexof(p1Array,"=")+1)
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), Activity, LogSeverity)
| extend Activity = column_ifexists('Activity', '')
| extend SecurityIndicatorName = Activity
| extend LogSeverity = column_ifexists('LogSeverity', '')
| extend Severity = LogSeverity
| extend Score = "0 F"
| extend Result = ""
| extend Timestamp = column_ifexists('Timestamp', '')
| extend FirstFound = Timestamp
| extend SecurityFrameworkTags = column_ifexists('SecurityFrameworkTags', ''))
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags) 
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(SecurityIndicatorName), tostring(Severity), tostring(Score), tostring(FirstFound), tostring(Result), tostring(SecurityFrameworkTags)
| order by Count
content.title: Indicators of Exposure (IoEs) Details:

content.query:
dsp_parser_new
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags) 
| where Result in ({Status})
| extend SecurityFrameworkTagList = parse_csv(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv)
| extend MitreFramework = pack_array({MitreFramework})
| extend FilterIntersection = set_intersect(SecurityFrameworkTagList, MitreFramework)
| extend FilterIntersectionCount = array_length(FilterIntersection)
| where FilterIntersectionCount > 0
| summarize Requests = count() by tostring(SecurityIndicatorName)
| order by Requests
content.title: Breakdown by Indicators of Exposure (IoEs)

content.query:
dsp_parser_new
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags) 
| where Result in ({Status})
| extend SecurityFrameworkTagList = parse_csv(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv)
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array SecurityFrameworkTagList to typeof(string)
| where SecurityFrameworkTagList in ({MitreFramework})
| summarize event_count=count() by SecurityFrameworkTagList
content.title: Amount of Generated Events per Category

content.query:
dsp_parser_new
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags) 
| where Result in ({Status})
| extend SecurityFrameworkTagList = parse_csv(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv)
| extend MitreFramework = pack_array({MitreFramework})
| extend FilterIntersection = set_intersect(SecurityFrameworkTagList, MitreFramework)
| extend FilterIntersectionCount = array_length(FilterIntersection)
| where FilterIntersectionCount > 0
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(SecurityIndicatorName)
| top 10 by Count desc
content.title: Top 10 Indicators of Exposure (IoEs)

content.query:
dsp_parser_new
| where isnotempty(SecurityFrameworkTags) 
| where Result in ({Status})
| extend SecurityFrameworkTagList = parse_csv(SecurityFrameworkTagsCsv)
| extend MitreFramework = pack_array({MitreFramework})
| extend FilterIntersection = set_intersect(SecurityFrameworkTagList, MitreFramework)
| extend FilterIntersectionCount = array_length(FilterIntersection)
| where FilterIntersectionCount > 0
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(SecurityFrameworkTags), tostring(SecurityIndicatorName), tostring(Remediation)
| top 10 by Count desc
| project-away Count
content.title: Top 10 Indicators of Exposure (IoEs) Details:
